---
name: Layer
menu: Components
---
import { PropsTable } from 'docz';
import { Layer } from '@marapp/earth-components';

# Layer
<PropsTable of={Layer} />

## Basic usage
```jsx
  <Layer
    className="-medium"
    name="icon-cross"
  />
```

## Default && active
<div>
  <Layer
    name="This is a layer"
    slug="this-is-a-layer"
    active={false}
  />
  <Layer
    name="This is a layer active"
    slug="this-is-another-layer"
    active={true}
  />
</div>

## Background && active
<div className="row">
  <div className="col-xs-6 col-md-2">
    <Layer
      background="data:image/png;base64,"
      name="This is a background layer"
      slug="this-is-a-layer"
      active={false}
    />
  </div>
  <div className="col-xs-6 col-md-2">
    <Layer
      background="data:image/png;base64,"
      name="This is a background layer active"
      slug="this-is-another-layer"
      active={true}
    />
  </div>
</div>

## Themes
<div className="row">
  <div className="col-xs">
    <h4>Default</h4>
    <Layer
      name="This is a layer"
      slug="this-is-a-layer"
      active={false}
    />
  </div>
  <div className="col-xs">
    <h4>Dark</h4>
    <Layer
      dark
      name="This is a layer"
      slug="this-is-a-layer"
      active={false}
    />
  </div>
</div>
